Ccommissioning¶

Setting up a rail¶

IOC Configuration¶

The following iocsh command may be used to configure an ek9000 device: .. code:

ek9000Configure(deviceName, ip, port, temrinal_count)

deviceName will be used to refer to the device later.

terminal_count defines how many terminals will be assocated with the device.

For each terminal, the following iocsh command must be used to configure it: .. code:

ek9000ConfigureTerminal

EPICS EK9000
